name: Alarmageddon
description:
MOTIVATION

This game was a challenge for myself to complete in a single weekend. I finished in two instead.

INSTRUCTIONS

Smash, shoot or destroy by any means all ringing alarms before you wake up completely. You will find weapons hidden in the room. If you touch one, it will be on the wall for you from then on, fully loaded.

Will you finally be able to have a good rest tonight?

HOW IT'S MADE

I made a video about how I made this game, and explained the things I learned during the process
